alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Dawson; Gaines; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 26 at 6:10PM CST until February 26 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Andrews County in western Texas... Gaines County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 610 PM CST, a dust channel was over Ackerly, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 151 and 162. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Lamesa, Seminole, Seagraves, Ackerly, Stanton, Seagraves Airport, Lenorah, Gaines County Airport, Welch, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Los Ybanez, Patricia, Arvana, Hancock, McKenzie Lake, Stanton Municipal Aiport, Gaines County Park, Loop and Tarzan. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
